responseText: NSLOCTEXT("[70199B914E7E03A9706A1499CF20B1FD]", "018322D840350A98964BA6991C157E3B", "After greeting him and introducing myself, I began to unfold a parchment containing the list of interview questions I had prepared in advance. He stopped me at once and bade me to follow him into his laboratory where he said I could meet someone far more fascinating than his antiquated self. When he led me to the \"laboratory,\" I must admit to a measure of disappointment. It was set up inside a large, rather threadbare tent. As he lifted the tent\'s flap revealing a meager assortment of alchemy equipment set on a table of rough-hewn planks, he noticed my disheartened look. The makeshift laboratory, he assured me, was only a temporary fix until a more permanent structure could be built. As my eyes adjusted to the flickering light of a few candles, I saw another figure moving about, quietly sniffing beakers and occasionally licking objects in the dark, to sample their taste.")
name: DD_Ambient_TotH2_14
